name: Silkroad Images LLC
description: Operator of stock photography and editorial content library intended to capture, accurately portray and disseminate the culture and traditions of the Middle East and beyond. The company's library offers photographic images and digital content such as vectors, sound effects, VAS images, and editorials segmented into multiple categories and sourced from experienced photographers, enabling clients to enjoy authentic oriental Middle East-focused photographs and videos.
